title: [Rails] ActionController::UnknownFormat
content: [Rails] ActionController::UnknownFormat Ruby on Rails Saturday, June 2, 2018 ActionController::UnknownFormat 77 respond_to do |format| 78	format.json  at the top of my controller i have respond_to :html, :js, :json -- You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google Groups "Ruby on Rails: Talk" group. contentWithMarkup:
ActionController::UnknownFormat
77 respond_to do |format|
78 format.json { render json: { message: "removed" }, status: :ok }

at the top of my controller i have
respond_to :html, :js, :json
